name: All You Need Is Love
content: 不相信我还能振作起来
How easy it is to walk through the fire
怎样才能轻易地克服这些困难
Opened the stars in my heart
You let in the life from the dark
你将我的生活从黑暗之中拯救出来
I realized that all you need is love
我知道 你只渴求着爱
And I'm feeling  never letting go
我感受到了 并且我永远不会放手
I realized that all you need is love
我知道 你只渴求着爱
I realized that all you need is love
我知道 你只渴求着爱
一直把我逼向悬崖边缘
我最好的结局就是纵身跳下
Opened the stars in my heart
You let in the life from the dark
你将我的生活从黑暗之中拯救出来
如同获得新生一般 我知道
That all you need is love
I realized that all you need is love
我知道 你只渴求着爱
